thread.title: Rick Roach Webvid focuses on fixing education in SD 13 race
thread.title_full: Rick Roach Webvid focuses on fixing education in SD 13 race

author: Frank Torres
title: Rick Roach Webvid focuses on fixing education in SD 13 race
text:
Rick Roach Webvid focuses on fixing education in SD 13 race October 9, 2015 Pinterest 0 
Former Orange County School Board Member and Candidate for State Senate District 13 Rick Roach released a web video on Friday afternoon rolling out his plan for education. 
The spot begins with Roach saying that the state is “micro-managing education” and adding “if we fix education, we fix Florida”. He continues with his platform that revolves around education, jobs, health care and, public safety. He weighs in on the controversial state testing system saying that it should be used “exactly the way it should be used” as one tool in measuring progress. He closes saying that education will fix Florida by reducing public assistance and incarceration costs. 
Roach is currently the only Democrat running in State Senate District 13. On the Republican side Realtor Dean Asher and retired contractor Chuck Sheridan are running to replace termed out State Senate President Andy Gardiner . 
You can check out Roach’s web video below… Readers who read this, also read these
